Jx.Store.Strategy.Save

Extends: Jx.Store.Strategy

A Store strategy class for saving data via protocols

License

Copyright © 2009, Jon Bomgardner.

This file is licensed under an MIT style license

Summary
Jx.Store.Strategy.SaveExtends: Jx.Store.Strategy
Options
autoSaveWhether the strategy should be watching the store to save changes automatically.
Functions
activateactivates the strategy if it isn’t already active.
deactivatedeactivates the strategy if it is already active.
updateRecordcalled by event handlers when store data is updated
saveRecordCalled by event handlers when a store record is added, or deleted.
saveCalled manually when the developer wants to save all data changes in one shot.

Options

autoSave

Whether the strategy should be watching the store to save changes automatically.  Set to True to watch events, set it to a number of milliseconds to have the strategy save every so many seconds

Functions

activate

activate: function ()

activates the strategy if it isn’t already active.

deactivate

deactivate: function ()

deactivates the strategy if it is already active.

updateRecord

updateRecord: function(index,
column,
oldValue,
newValue)

called by event handlers when store data is updated

Parameters

index{Integer} the row that was affected
column{String} the column that was affected
oldValue{Mixed} the previous value
newValue{Mixed} the new value

saveRecord

saveRecord: function (store,
record)

Called by event handlers when a store record is added, or deleted.  If deleted, the record will be removed from the deleted array.

Parameters

recordThe Jx.Record instance that was changed
storeThe instance of the store

save

save: function ()

Called manually when the developer wants to save all data changes in one shot.  It will empty the deleted array and reset all other status flags
